description:
Jherrad is gonna be a major porn star. He's already done some big scenes with big stars, but wanted to give 'amateur' another try. It was great working with someone who could just roll with a scene.
My primary goal was to photograph this boy with the amazing cheekbones and liquid black eyes.
We filmed a solo, just to see how well we worked together, but my secondary mission was to hook him up with some of the guys on the site. Look for more projects with Jherrad in the future.
title: Jherrad - Solo
